Join us on Saturday, October 14 for our Reproductive Freedom Project Benefit. Online ticket sales for the event end Monday, October 9. If you haven't already, be sure to purchase your tickets today.

We're excited to celebrate last week's WIN in our challenge to Kentucky's narrated ultrasound law – a federal judge declared it unconstitutional. This year's event also comes as our legal program fights in federal court to keep the doors open at Kentucky's only remaining abortion clinic through a challenge to Kentuckyâ€™s transfer / transport agreements.
